author: 14 Principles
description:
Unique board-syncing tool for Scrum Masters and Project Managers
What's in it for you and your team?

Gain control

* Track your project visually so that you see where everything is at a glance and spend less time in status meetings.
* You and your team can see problems on the horizon and fix them before they happen.
* Avoid being overloaded by prioritizing, so everyone is working on the right stuff at the right time.
* Flexible workflows adapt to your project so that you can be up and running in minutes.

Stay organised

* Project management software is only as good as the data that you feed it. It's no use if your team finds it too cumbersome to update.
* If you team is already working with a physical board they are already doing enough to update Boardsync; moving across the board.
* Just take a photo of the board every day and Boardsync is up-to-date.

"Full visibility (wherever you are)

* If you're responsible for a project you'll know that free flow of information is critical to its success. Boardsync works on your mobile, so you, your team and your clients can check on status whevever they are.
* Nothing trumps a physical board for keeping project status up front and centre. With Boardsync, the whole organisation can keep the best of both worlds; maximum visibility inside the building and mobility for stakeholders elsewhere.

Integrate with other tools

* Already invested in project management tooling? Don't want to move? Boardsync integrates with popular project management tools like AgileZen, LeanKit Kanban and Atlassian Greenhopper.
* A complete RESTful API gives you full and open access with complete integration flexibility.

The best of both worlds

Get the benefits of a digital board…
* Available anywhere, digital boards are great for distributed teams.
* Visibility to customers and stakeholders.
* Metrics and measurements.
* Auditing and history.

…and keep the benefits of a physical board
* Quick and simple, just reach out to change things.
* The best way to keep the work visible to the team.
* Acts as a focal point for the most effective form of team communication: face to face.
name: Boardsync
